titles.title: We Must Run, Run, Run This Race That's Set Before Us

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
We must run, run, run
The race that's set before us,
We must run, run, run
Until the race is won,
Let us lay aside each weight
And the sin that doth beset us
And we'll run, run, run
Until the race is won.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Jesus ran, ran, ran
The race that was before Him
And He won, won, won,
He is now at God's right hand
And together with the cloud
Of witnesses He's calling us
To run, run, run
Until the race is won.
